summary: The Wildland Firefighter Paycheck Protection Act of 2025 aims to improve the compensation and working conditions of federal wildland firefighters. It establishes special base rates of pay, provides incident response premium pay, and grants rest and recuperation leave. The bill also amends existing law to include prevailing rate employees and addresses funding transfers related to firefighter salary increases. Ultimately, this bill seeks to increase compensation and improve the benefits enjoyed by wildland firefighters.
